other_tests.findings: Dermal palisading granuloma with multinucleated giant cells and leukocytoclastic debris.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The findings were consistent with palisaded neutrophilic and granulomatous dermatitis; no progression or changes over time were stated.

other_tests.findings: Necrotizing small-vessel vasculitis with erythrocyte extravasation and leukocytoclastic debris.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The biopsy findings were indicative of leukocytoclastic vasculitis; no progression or changes over time were stated.
The titer declined from 31,744 to 13,312 units eight days after treatment and gradually became negative over the next 22 months.

other_tests.findings: Ground-glass opacities in central peribronchial regions, consistent with alveolar hemorrhage.
other_tests.changes_over_time: No follow-up imaging was performed; no changes over time were stated.
